thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: Calum Cameron
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Calum Cameron

author: Calum Cameron
title: Calum Cameron
text: Ace Rentals do not provide this year's model vehicle and, because of this, are not charging an arm and a leg to lease from them. I had three rentals, for three different locations, while in NZ and drove recent model Nissans and a Toyota Camry just as I had pre-ordered. Totaled close to 3500 kms over the month and not one problem. Cars were clean and were well maintained. Nothing else to be said . . . . book from these folks as they are courteous and caring! 'Nuff said!!
